## 1.0.1 (2025-03-17)

* Move test-helper.js functionality to cli-helper ([MGNLCLI-307](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-307))
* Address deprecated packages ([MGNLCLI-320](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-320))
* Ensure mgnl start uses the right CATALINA_HOME ([MGNLCLI-352](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-352))
* Add missing keys to i18n file ([MGNLCLI-356](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-356))

## 1.0.0 (2024-10-14)
* introduce `@magnolia/cli-start-plugin` package
